passive.name: Insight
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. For every <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> of DEF the wearer has, increases the wearer's DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[f1]%</unbreak></color>, up to a maximum DMG increase of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>.
